snippet.title: Swift Animations: Awesome Facebook Pop Up! Press and Hold (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
Another amazing animation tutorial for folks looking to create some cool effects in their apps.  Today's video goes over UILongPressGestureRecognizer and transformations to get objects onto the screen.  Its a fun exercise and should teach you a bunch of different skills. Enjoy.
